org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeInMemoryLockManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeManagerAdapter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeAbstractLockManager
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeInMemoryLockManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeLockManager, IAeManager
public class AeInMemoryLockManager
extends AeAbstractLockManager

This class implements a simple in-memory process def lock manager.

Method Detail

create

public void create()
            throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: IAeManager
Gets called once after the manager has been instantiated. If the manager runs into any kind of fatal error during create then it should throw an exception which will halt the startup of the application.

Specified by:
create in interface IAeManager
Overrides:
create in class AeManagerAdapter
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
IAeManager.create()

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from interface: IAeManager
Stops the manager. It may be restarted or destroyed from this point. Note that this method may be called by the engine even though a corresponding start method has not yet been called. This can happen when some other manager fails to start.

Specified by:
stop in interface IAeManager
Overrides:
stop in class AeManagerAdapter
See Also:
IAeManager.stop()
